item.description:
Dear Boston Volunteers,

Thank you for all the volunteers helping the Project Doggy. You guys are doing a great job in the team. This time we will be looking at the event site, will go for a short walk and end up in Margaritas. I want to recruit more people to help you with the activities.

Current Project Doggy Volunteers: Please plan to attend this meeting if you can. Just to keep track of our progress, achievement and pick up flyers and posters.

Prospective Volunteers: We are still recruiting volunteers for the following positions

  1. Offline Campaign and Public Relations
  2. Publicity and marketing
  3. Community outreach
  4. Event organizers
  5. Volunteer co-ordinators
  6. Photoraphers
  7. Artists (for the signs)
  8. Active Volunteers or pet lovers

Learn more about this project: www.doggyfunrun.org

If you interested to volunteer or give some ideas or support the project, please join us at

Margaritas and the Doggy Fun Run Venue at 2 PM.

Lets go dinner after the meeting at Margaritas.

Thank you and see you soon.

Phani

The Boston Volunteers
Big Enough to Deliver, Small Enough to Care
Learn more: www.BostonVolunteer.org

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Project Doggy Organizers/volunteers Meet
